div.p: Ulpius Cerealis, tax-farmer of the Sacred Gate of Syene, through me Pachnoubis, son of Petorzmethis. Neilamonchis paid for the survey-tax on date-land for the harvest of the 21st year, on the account of Neilamonchis, son of Onnophris: six drachmas, total: 6 drachmas. Year 22, on the 17th of Pharmouthi. (F. A. J. Hoogendijk)
